    • Method Detail

      • createVolume

        public com.github.dockerjava.api.command.CreateVolumeResponse createVolume(java.lang.String name,
                                                                           java.lang.String driver,
                                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> driverOpts)
        Create a docker volume.
        /!\ If you don't want to use a param marked as optional, simply pass null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the volume (optional).
        driver - The driver of the volume (optional).
        driverOpts - The driver options of the volume (optional).
        Returns:
        The created volume.

      • listVolumes

        public com.github.dockerjava.api.command.ListVolumesResponse listVolumes(java.lang.String name,
                                                                         java.lang.String driver,
                                                                         java.lang.Boolean dangling)
        List all docker volumes, filtered by given filters if any.
        /!\ If you don't want to use a param marked as optional, simply pass null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the volume (optional).
        driver - The driver of the volume (optional).
        dangling - true if only volumes not used by containers should be returned, false otherwise (optional).
        Returns:
        The list of volumes.
